GK16ruyalssu:5: iha hi tāvad bhāmahodbhaṭaprabhṛtayaścirantanālaṅkārakārāḥ pratīyamānamarthe vācyopaskārakatayālaṅkārapakṣanikṣitpaṃ manyante /
GK16ruyalssu:8: iti yathāyogaṃ dvividhayā bhaṅgyā pratipāditaṃ taiḥ /
GK16ruyalssu:14: vāmanena tu sādṛśyanibandhanāyā lakṣaṇāya vakroktyalaṅkāratvaṃ bruvatā kaściddhvanibhedo 'laṅkāratayaivoktaḥ /
GK16ruyalssu:19: tadevamalaṅkārā eva kāvye pradhānamiti prācyānāṃ matam / [RuAss_Bhū.2]
GK16ruyalssu:23: satyapi tribhede pratīyamāne vyāpārarūpā bhaṇitireva kavisaṃrambhagocaraḥ /
GK16ruyalssu:27: bhaṭṭanāyakena tu vyaṅgyavyāpārasya prauḍhoktyābhyupagatasya kāvyaṃśatvaṃ bruvatā nyagbhāvitaśabdārthasvarūpasya vyāpārasyaiva prādhānyamuktam
GK16ruyalssu:31: ca vyāṅgyarūpasya guṇālaṅkāropaskartavyatvena prādhānyād viśrāntidhāmatvādātmatvaṃ sidhdāntitavān /
GK16ruyalssu:32: vyāpārasya viṣayamukhena svaruṇpratilambhāt tatprādhānyena prādhānyāt svarūpeṇa vicāryatvābhāvād viṣayasyaiva samagrabharasahiṣṇutvam /
GK16ruyalssu:33: tasmād viṣaya eva vyaṅgyanāmā jīvitatvena vaktavyaḥ,
GK16ruyalssu:38: tasmād vyaṅgya eva vākyārthībhūtaḥ kāvyajīvitamityeṣa eva pakṣo vākyārthavidāṃ sahṛdayānāmāvarjakaḥ /
GK16ruyalssu:40: yattu vyaktivivekakāro vācyasya pratīyamānaṃ prati liṅgatayā vyañjanasyānumānāntarbhāvamākhyat tad vācyasya pratīyamānena saha tādāpmyatadutpattyabhāvādavicāritābhidhānam
GK16ruyalssu:43: tatra vyaṅgyasya prādhānyāprādhānyābhyāṃ dhvaniguṇībhūtavyaṅgyākhyau dvau kāvyabhedau /
GK16ruyalssu:59: ihārthapaunaruktyaṃ śabdapaunaruktyaṃ śabdārthapaunaruktyaṃ ceti trayaḥ paunaruktyaprakārāḥ // RuAss_1 //
GK16ruyalssu:61: arthāpekṣayā śabdasya pratītāvantaraṅgatve 'pi prathamamarthatadharmanirdeśaścirantanaprasiddhyā punaruktakavadābhāsasya pūrvaṃ lakṣaṇārthaḥ
GK16ruyalssu:88: alaṃkāraprastāve kevalaṃ svarapaunaruktyamacārutvānna gaṇyate iti dvaividhyameva /
GK16ruyalssu:93: 'kiṃ nāma dardura duradhyavasāya sāyaṃ kāyaṃ nipīḍya ninadaṃ kuruṣe ruṣeva /
GK16ruyalssu:94: etāni kelirasitāni sitacchadānāmākarṇya kārṇamadhurāṇi na lajjito 'si' //
GK16ruyalssu:95: atra sāyaṃśabdenāsyālaṅkārasya yakāramātrasādṛśyāpekṣayā vṛttyanuprāsena sahaikābhidhānalakṣaṇaḥ saṃkaraḥ /
GK16ruyalssu:105: 'āṭopena paṭīyayasā yadapi sā vāṇī kaverāmukhe khelantī prathame tathāpi kurute no sanmanorañjanam /
GK16ruyalssu:108: 'sahyāḥ pannagaphūtkṛtānalaśikhā nārācapālyo 'pi vā rākendoḥ kiraṇā viṣadravamuco varṣāsu vā vāyavaḥ /
GK16ruyalssu:109: na tvetāḥ saralāḥ sitāsitarucaḥ sācīkṛtāḥ sālasāḥ sākūtāḥ samadāḥ kuraṅgakadṛśāṃ mānānuvidhdā dṛśaḥ' //
GK16ruyalssu:112: atra kvacidbhinnārthatvaṃ kvicidabhinnārthatvaṃ kacidekasyānarthakatvamaparasya sārthakatvamiti saṃkṣepataḥ prakāratrayam /
GK16ruyalssu:129: 'tālā jaanti guṇā jālā de sahiaehiṃ gheppanti /
GK16ruyalssu:133: 'brūmaḥ kiyannaya kathañcana kālamalpam atrābjapatranayane nayane nimīlya /
GK16ruyalssu:148: yadyapi lipyakṣarāṇāṃ khaṅgādisaṃniveśaviśiṣṭatvaṃ tathāpi śrotrākāśasamavetavarṇātmakaśabdābhedena teṣāṃ loke pratītervācakaśabdālaṅkāro 'yam
GK16ruyalssu:165: yadāhuḥ-'yatra kiñcitsāmānyaṃ kaściñca viśeṣaḥ sa viṣayaḥ sadṛśatāyāḥ' iti /
GK16ruyalssu:174: saṃskāravatyeva girā manīṣī tayā sa pūtaśca vibhūṣitaśca' //
GK16ruyalssu:176: digdho 'mṛtena ca viṣeṇa ca pakṣmalākṣyā gāḍhaṃ nikhāta iva me hṛdaye kaṭākṣaḥ' //
GK16ruyalssu:188: 'yuddhe 'rjuno 'rjuna iva prathitapratāpo bhīmo 'pi bhīma iva vairiṣu bhīmakarmā /
GK16ruyalssu:195: iyaṃ ca dharmasya sādhāraṇye vastuprativastunirdeśe ca dvidhā /
GK16ruyalssu:197: 'khamiva jalaṃ jalamiva khaṃ haṃsaścandra iva haṃsa iva candraḥ /
GK16ruyalssu:219: 'yairdṛṣṭo 'si tadā lalāṭapatitaprāsaprahāro yudhi sphītāsṛkstrutipāṭalīkṛtapurobhāgaḥ parān pātayan /
GK16ruyalssu:220: teṣāṃ duḥsahakāmadehadahanaprodbhatanetrānala- jvālālībharabhāsvare smaripāvastaṃ gataṃ kautukam' //
GK16ruyalssu:230: anyathā tu viṣayiṇā viṣayasya rūpavataḥ karaṇādrūpakam /
GK16ruyalssu:233: 'upamaiva turobhūtabhedā rūpakamiṣyate' iti āropādabhede 'dhyavasāyaḥ prakṛṣyate iti paścāttanmūlālaṅkāravibhāgaḥ /
GK16ruyalssu:234: idaṃ tu niravayavaṃ sāvayavaṃ paramparitamiti trividham /
GK16ruyalssu:239: anye tū pratyekaṃ vākyoktasamāsoktādibhedāḥ saṃbhavanti te 'nyato draṣṭavyāḥ /
GK16ruyalssu:241: 'dāse kṛtāgāsi bhavatyucitaḥ prabhūṇāṃ pādaprahāra iti sundari nāsmi dūye /
GK16ruyalssu:242: udyatkaṭhorapulakāṅkurakaṇṭakāgrair- yatkhidyate tava padaṃ nanu sā vyathā me' //
GK16ruyalssu:244: dvirbhāvaḥ smarakārmukasya kimapi prāṇeśvarīsāgasā- māśātanturudañcati pratipadi prāleyabhānostanuḥ' //
GK16ruyalssu:248: indutviṣo yudhi haṭhena tavārikīrtī- rānīya yatra ramate taruṇaḥ pratāpaḥ' //
GK16ruyalssu:251: 'kiṃ padmamya ruciṃ na hanti nayanānandaṃ vidhatte na vā vṛddhiṃ vā jhaṣaketanasya kurute nālokamātreṇa kim /
GK16ruyalssu:252: vaktrendau tava satyayaṃ yadaparaḥ śītāṃśurabhyudgato darpaḥ syādamṛtena cidiha tadapyastyeva bimbādhare' //
GK16ruyalssu:255: satyaprītividhānadakṣa vijayaprāgbhāvabhīma prabho sāmrājyaṃ varavīra vatsaraśataṃ vairiñcamuccaiḥ kriyāḥ' //
GK16ruyalssu:256: atra tvameva haṃsa ityāropaṇapūrvako mānasameva mānasamityādyāropa iti śliṣṭaśabdaṃ mālāparamparitam /
GK16ruyalssu:266: yaireṣāpi durāśayā kaliyuge rājāvalī sevitā teṣāṃ śūlini bhaktimātrasulabhe sevā kiyatkauśalam' //
GK16ruyalssu:267: atra cāropyamāṇasya dharmitvādāviṣṭaliṅgasaṃkhyātve 'pi kvacitsvato 'saṃbhavatsaṃkhyāyogasyāpi viṣayasaṃkhyātvam pratyekamāropāt /
GK16ruyalssu:271: maraṇaṃ ca jaladabhujagajaṃ prasahya kurute viṣaṃ viyoginīnām' //
GK16ruyalssu:272: ityatra niyatasaṃkhyākakāryaviśeṣotthāpito garalārthaprabhāvito viṣaśabde śleṣa eva /
GK16ruyalssu:273: jaladabhujagajamiti rūpakasādhakamiti pūrve siddhatvābhāvānna tannicanvanaṃ viṣaśabde śliṣṭaśabdaṃ paramparitamiti śleṣa evātretyāhuḥ /
GK16ruyalssu:276: āropyamāṇaṃ rūpake prakṛtopayogitvābhāvātprakṛtoparañjakatvenaiva kevalenānvayaṃ bhajate pariṇāme tu prakṛtātmatayā āropyamāṇasyopayoga iti prakṛtamāropyamāṇarūpatvena pariṇamiti /
GK16ruyalssu:281: vyāmagrāhyastanībhiḥ śabarayuvatibhiḥ kautukodañcadakṣaṃ kṛcchrādanvīyamānastvaritamaya giriṃ citrakūṭaṃ pratasthe' //
GK16ruyalssu:284: tadatra yathā samāsoktāvāronyamāṇaṃ prakṛtopayogi taccāropaviṣayātmatayā tatra sthitam,
GK16ruyalssu:285: ata eva tatra tadvyavahārasamāropaḥ evamihāpi jñeyam,
GK16ruyalssu:306: 'kiṃ tāruṇyataroriyaṃ rasabharodbhinnā navā vallarī līlāprocchalitasya kiṃ laharikā lāvaṇyavārāṃnidheḥ /
GK16ruyalssu:307: udgāḍhotkalikāvatāṃ svasamayopanyāsavistrambhiṇaḥ kiṃ sākṣādupadeśayaṣṭirathavā devasya śṛṅgāriṇaḥ' //
GK16ruyalssu:310: 'ayaṃ mārtaṇḍaḥ kiṃ sa khalu turagaiḥ satpabhiritaḥ kṛśānuḥ kiṃ sākṣātprasarati diśo naiṣa niyatam /
GK16ruyalssu:311: kṛtāntaḥ kiṃ sākṣānmahiṣavahano 'sāviti cirāt samalokyājau tvāṃ vidadhati vikalpānpratibhaṭāḥ' //
GK16ruyalssu:312: niścayānto yatra saṃśaya upakramo niścaye paryavasānam /
GK16ruyalssu:314: 'induḥ kiṃ kva kalaṅkaḥ sarasijametatkimambu kutra gatam /
GK16ruyalssu:318: 'rañjitā nu vividhāstaruśailā nāmitaṃ tu gaganaṃ mthagitaṃ nu /
GK16ruyalssu:319: pūritā nu viṣameṣu dharitrī saṃhṛtā nu kakubhastimireṇa' //
GK16ruyalssu:330: 'oṣṭhe bimbaphalāśayālamalakeṣūtpākajambūdhiyā karṇolaṅkṛtibhāji dāḍimaphalabhrāntyā ca śoṇe bhaṇau /
GK16ruyalssu:331: niṣpattyā sakṛdutpalacchadadṛśāmāttaklamānāṃ marau rājangṛrjararājapañjaraśukaiḥ sadyastṛṣā mūrcchitam' //
GK16ruyalssu:339: evaṃ sthāṇurvā syātpuruṣo vā syāditi saṃśaye 'pi boddhavyam /
GK16ruyalssu:351: 'yastapovanamit.i munibhiḥ kāmāyatanamiti veśyābhiḥ saṃgītaśāleti lāsakaiḥ' ityādi harṣacarite śrīkaṇṭhākhyajanapadavarṇane /
GK16ruyalssu:354: nanvetanmadhye 'vajravañjaramiti śaraṇāgatairasuravivaramiti vātikaiḥ' ityādau rūpakālaṅkārayoga iti kathamayamullekhālaṅkāraviṣayaḥ /
GK16ruyalssu:358: yatra tu rūpakaṃ vyavasthitaṃ tatra cediyamapi bhaṅgiḥ saṃbhāvinī tatsaṃkaro 'stu /
GK16ruyalssu:361: evaṃ hi tatra viṣaye bhrāntimadalaṅkāro 'stu atadrūpasya tadrūpatāpratītinibandhanatvāt /
GK16ruyalssu:368: grahītṛbhedākhyena viṣayavibhāgenānekadhātvoṭṭaṅkanāttasya ca vicchittyantararūpatvāt sarvathā nāsyāntarbhāvaḥ śakyakriya iti niścayaḥ /
GK16ruyalssu:369: yathā vā- 'ṇārāaṇot ti pariṇaavaāhiṃ sirivallahot ti taruṇīhiṃ /
GK16ruyalssu:370: bālāhiṃ uṇa kodūhaleṇa eme a saccavio' //
GK16ruyalssu:372: bālābhiḥ panaḥ kautūhalena evameva satyāpitaḥ' //)// evam
GK16ruyalssu:376: nanvanekadhātvollekhane gurvādirūpatayā śleṣa iti kathamalaṅkārāntaramatra sthāpyate /
GK16ruyalssu:378: anekadhātvanimittaṃ tu vicchittyantaramatra dṛśyate iti tatpratibhotpattihetuḥ śleṣo 'tra syāt /
GK16ruyalssu:394: 'yadetaccandrāntarjaladalavalīlāṃ prakurute tadācaṣṭe lokaḥ śaśaka iti no māṃ prati tathā /
GK16ruyalssu:396: atraindavasya śaśasyāpahnave upakṣitpe śaśakaprativastukiṇavata indorāropo nānvayaghaṭanāṃ puṣyatīti na niravadyam /
GK16ruyalssu:397: tattu yathā 'pūrṇendoḥ paripoṣakāntavapuṣaḥ sphāraprabhābhāsvaraṃ nedaṃ maṇḍalamabhyayudeni gaganābhoge jigīṣorjagat /
GK16ruyalssu:401: na tu rucirakalāpe vartate yo mayūre vitaratu sa kumāro brahmacaryaśriyaṃ vaḥ' //
GK16ruyalssu:404: sārdhaṃ tvadripubhistvadīyaśasāṃ śūnye marau dhāvatāṃ bhraṣṭaṃ rājamṛgāṅkaṃ/
GK16ruyalssu:406: atra śūnya ityasya sthāne manyeśabdaprayoge sāpahnavotprekṣā ittayapi sthāpayiṣyate,
GK16ruyalssu:407: ' ahaṃ tvinduṃ manye ' iti tu vākyabhede manyeśabdaprayogenotprekṣeti ca vakṣyate /
GK16ruyalssu:408: etasminnapi bhedo 'pahnavāropayoḥ paurvāparyaprayogaviparyaye bhedadvayaṃ sadapi na pūrvavaccitratāvahamiti na bhedatvena gaṇitam /
GK16ruyalssu:412: dvīpāddvīpaṃ bhramati dadhatī candramudākāpāne nyastaṃ siddhāñjanaparimalaṃ lāñcanasya cchalena' //
GK16ruyalssu:414: 'amuṣmiṃllāvaṇyāmṛtasarasi nūnaṃ mṛgadṛśaḥ smaraḥ śarvapluṣṭaḥ pṛthujaghanabhāge nipatitaḥ /
GK16ruyalssu:415: yadaṅgāṅgārāṇāṃ praśamapiśunā nābhikuhare khikhā dhūmasyeyaṃ pariṇamati romāvalivapuḥ' //
GK16ruyalssu:423: asatyatvaṃ ca viṣayigatasya dharmasya viṣaya upanibandhe viṣayisaṃbhāvitvena viṣayāsaṃbhāvitvena ca pratīteḥ /
GK16ruyalssu:424: dharmo,guṇakriyārūpaḥ tasya saṃbhavāsaṃbhavapratītau saṃbhavāśrayasya tatrāparamārthatayā asatyatvaṃ pratīyate,
GK16ruyalssu:432: tatra sādhyatvapratītau vyāpāraprādhānye 'dhyavasāyaḥ saṃbhāvanamabhimānastarka ūhṛ utprekṣetyādiśabdairucyate /
GK16ruyalssu:437: prakṛtasyaitadbhedayoge 'pi na vaicitryamiti na te gaṇitāḥ /
GK16ruyalssu:439: bhedāṣṭakasya ca pratyekaṃ nimittasya guṇākriyārūpatve ṣoḍaśa bhedāḥ /
GK16ruyalssu:443: tatrāpi dravyasya prāyaḥ svarūpotprekṣaṇameveti hetuphalotprekṣābhedāstataḥ pātanīyāḥ /
GK16ruyalssu:445: tathāpi nimittasyānupādānaṃ tasyāṃ na saṃbhavatīti tairbhedair yūno 'yaṃ prakāraḥ /
GK16ruyalssu:448: eṣā cārthāśrayati dharmaviṣaye śliṣṭaśabdahetukā kvacitpadārthānvayavelāyāṃ sādṛśyābhivānādupakrāntāpyupamāvākyārthatātparyasāmarythābhimantṛvyāpāropārohakrameṇotprekṣāyāṃ paryavasyati /
GK16ruyalssu:453: 'sa vaḥ pāyādindurnavabisalatākoṭikuṭilaḥ- smārāreryo mūrdhni jvalanakapiśo bhāti nihitaḥ /
GK16ruyalssu:454: stravanmandākinyāḥ pratidivasasiktena payasā kapālenonmuktaḥ sphaṭikadhavalenāṅkura iva' //
GK16ruyalssu:462: 'saiṣā sthalī yatra vicinvatā tvāṃ bhraṣṭaṃ mayā nūpuramekamurvyām /
GK16ruyalssu:477: kriyāyā yathā- r'idṛkṣāṃ kṣāmatāṃ gatau' ityatra kṣāmatāgamanasya /
GK16ruyalssu:481: svārūpotprekṣā yathā - 'kuberajuṣṭāṃ diśamuṣṇaraśmau gantuṃ pravṛtte samayaṃ vilaṅghya /
GK16ruyalssu:482: dig dakṣiṇā gandhavahaṃ mukhena vyalīkaniḥ śvāsamivotsasarja' //
GK16ruyalssu:483: phalotprekṣā yathā - 'colasya yadbhītipalāyitasya bhālatvacaṃ kaṇṭakino vanāntāḥ /
GK16ruyalssu:497: upamopakramotprekṣā yathā - 'kastūrītilakanti bhālaphalake devyā mukhāmbhoruhe rolambanti tamālabālamukulottaṃsanti maulāvapi /
GK16ruyalssu:498: yāḥ karṇe vikacotpalanti kucayoraṅke ca kālāguru- sthāsanti prathayantu tāstava śivaṃ śrīkaṇṭhakaṇṭhatviśaṣaḥ' //
GK16ruyalssu:499: atra yadyapi 'sarvaprātipadikebhyaḥ kkip' ityupamānātkkibvidhāvāmukhe upamāpratītistathāpyupamānasya prakṛte saṃbhavaucityātsaṃbhāvanotthane utprekṣāyāṃ paryavasānam /
GK16ruyalssu:501: eṣāpi samastopamāpratīpādakaviṣaye 'pi harṣacaritavārtite sāhityamīmāṃsāyāṃ ca teṣu teṣu pradeśeṣudāhṛtā,
GK16ruyalssu:509: tatprayoge tu prakṛtasya rājñaḥ pākaśāsanatvapratītāvadhyavasāyasaṃbhāvādivaśabdena ca tasya sādhyatvapratīterutprekṣaiveyam /
GK16ruyalssu:512: tadevaṃ prakāravaicitryeṇāvasthitāyā utprekṣāyā hetūtprekṣāyāṃ yasya prakṛtasaṃbandhino
GK16ruyalssu:513: dharmasya heturutprekṣate sa dharmo 'dhyavasāyavaśādabhinna utprekṣāyāṃ nimittatvenāśrīyate /
GK16ruyalssu:514: sa ca vācya eva niyamena bhavati /
GK16ruyalssu:517: atra kapolayoḥ prakṛtayoḥ saṃbandhitvenopāttasya kṣāmatāgamanasya heturadarśanamutprekṣitam /
GK16ruyalssu:519: evam 'adṛśyata tvaccaraṇāravindaviśleṣaduḥkhādiva baddhamaunam'ityatra nūpuragatasya maunitvasya heturduḥkhitvam /
GK16ruyalssu:522: svarūpotprekṣāyāṃ yatra dharmī dharmyantaragatatvenotpekṣyate tatrāpi nimittabhūto dharmaḥ kkacinnirdiśyate /
GK16ruyalssu:526: yatra ca dharma eva dharmigatatvenotprekṣyate tatrāpi nimittasyopādānānupādānābhyam /
GK16ruyalssu:532: atra tamotatatvena lepanakriyākartṛtvopekṣāyāṃ vyāpanādi nimittaṃ gamyamānam /
GK16ruyalssu:537: phalotprekṣāyāṃ yadeva tasya kāraṇaṃ tadeva nimittam /
GK16ruyalssu:544: tadasāvutprekṣāyāḥ kakṣyāvibhāgaḥ pracuratayā sthito 'pi lakṣye duravadhāratvādiha na prapañcitaḥ /
GK16ruyalssu:547: yathodāhṛtaṃ prāk 'ahaṃ tvinduṃ manye tvadariviraha' ityādi /
GK16ruyalssu:551: adhyavasāne trayaṃ saṃbhavati- svarūpaṃ viṣayo viṣayī ca /
GK16ruyalssu:573: yathā vā-- 'maggialaddhaṃmi valāmoḍiacuṃbieṃ apyaṇā a uvaṇamie /
GK16ruyalssu:579: 'lāvaṇyadraviṇavyayo na gaṇitaḥ kleśo mahānsvīkṛtaḥ svacchandaṃ carato janasya hṛdaye cintājvaro nirmitaḥ /
GK16ruyalssu:580: eṣāpi svaguṇānurūparamaṇābhāvād varākī hatā ko 'rthaścetasi vedhasā vinihitastanvyāstanuṃ tanvatā' //
GK16ruyalssu:582: yathā vā-- 'asyāḥ sargavidhau prajāpatipabhūccandro nu kāntipradaḥ śṛṅgāraikarasaḥ svayaṃ nu madano māso nu puṣkākaraḥ /
GK16ruyalssu:583: vedābhyāsajaḍaḥ kathaṃ nu viṣayavyāvṛttakautūhalo nirmātuṃ prabhavenmanoharamidaṃ rūpaṃ purāṇo muniḥ' //
GK16ruyalssu:588: atra saṃbhāvanayā saṃbandhaḥ yathā vā- 'dāho 'mbhaḥprasṛtiṃpacaḥ pracayavān bāṣpaḥ praṇālocitaḥ śvāsāḥ preṅkhikatadīpradīpakalikāḥ pāṇṭimni magnaṃ vapuḥ /
GK16ruyalssu:589: kiṃ tāmyatkathagrāmi rātrimakhilāṃ tvanmārgavātāgrane hastacchattraniruddhacandramahasastasyāḥ sthitirvartate' //
GK16ruyalssu:601: tathā hi 'kamalamanambhasi' ityādau vadanādīnāṃ kamalādyairbhede 'pi vāstavaṃ saundaryaṃ kavisamarpitena saundaryeṇābhedenādhyavasitaṃ bhede 'bhedavacanasya nimittam /
GK16ruyalssu:605: tatra hi 'aṇṇaṃ laḍahṛttaṇaaṃ' ityādau sātiśayaṃ laḍahatvaṃ nimittabhūtabhedenādhyavasitam /
GK16ruyalssu:608: prakārapañcakamadhyātkāryakāraṇabhāvena yaḥ prakāraḥ sa kāryakāraṇatāśrayālaṅkāraprastāve prapañcārthaṃ lakṣiyiṣyate /
GK16ruyalssu:611: tatrāpi padārthavākyārtagatatvena teṣāṃ dvaividhye padārthagatamalaṅkāradvayaṃ krameṇocyate-
GK16ruyalssu:612: aupamyasya gamyatve padārthagatatvena prastutānāmaprastutānāṃ vā samānadharmābhisaṃbandhe tulyayogitā // RuAss_24 //
GK16ruyalssu:614: tatra prākaraṇikānāmapraraṇikānāṃ vārthānāṃ samānaguṇakriyāsaṃbandhe anvitārthā tulyayogitā /
GK16ruyalssu:618: atra ṛtuvarṇanasya prakāntatvāddinānāṃ padmānāṃ ca prakṛtatvād vṛddhigamanaṃ kriyā /
GK16ruyalssu:626: bhagnasya gūrjaranṛpasya rajaḥ kayāpi tanvyā tavāsilatayā ca yaśaḥ prabhṛṣṭam' //
GK16ruyalssu:627: atra gūrjaraṃ prati nāyikāsilatayoraprākaraṇikatve mārjanaṃ kriyā /
GK16ruyalssu:643: vastutastu vākyārthatve ādimadhyāntavākyagatatvena dharmasya vṛttāvādibhamadhyāntadīpakākhyāstrayo 'sya bhedāḥ /
GK16ruyalssu:644: krameṇodāharaṇam - 'rehai mihireṇa ṇahaṃ raseṇa kavvaṃ sareṇa jovvaṇaaṃ /
GK16ruyalssu:646: ('reyate mihireṇa nabho rasena kāvyaṃ sareṇa [smareṇa] yauvanam amṛtena dhunīdhavaḥsvayā naramātha/
GK16ruyalssu:649: pracakrame pallavarāgatāmrā prabhā pataṅgasya munaśca dhenuḥ' //
GK16ruyalssu:655: atra ca yathānekakārakagatatvennaikakriyā dīpakaṃ tathānekakriyāgatatvenaikakārakamapi dīpakam /
GK16ruyalssu:658: na kutūhali kasya manaścaritaṃ ca mahātmanāṃ śrotum' //
GK16ruyalssu:662: vākyārthagatatvena sāmānyasya vākyadvaye pṛthaṅnirdeśe prativastūpamā // RuAss_26 //
GK16ruyalssu:679: yathātraivottarasthāne 'vināvantīrna nipuṇāḥ sudṛśo ratanarmaṇi' iti pāṭhe /
GK16ruyalssu:688: devīṃ vācamupāsate hi bahyavaḥ sāraṃ tu sārastvataṃ jānīte nitarāmasau gurukulakliṣṭo murāriḥ kaviḥ' //
GK16ruyalssu:689: atra yadyapi ñcānākhya eko dharmo nirdiṣṭastathāpi na tannibandhanamaupabhyaṃ vivakṣitam /
GK16ruyalssu:690: yannibandhanaṃ ca vivakṣitaṃ tatrābdhilaṅghanādāvastyeva divyavāgupāsanādinā pratibimbanam /
GK16ruyalssu:692: 'kṛtaṃ ca garvābhimukhaṃ manastvayā kimanyadevaṃ nihatāśca no 'rayaḥ /
GK16ruyalssu:696: saṃbhāvatāsaṃbhavatā vā vastusaṃbandhena gamyamānaṃ pratibimbakaraṇaṃ nidarśanā // RuAss_28 //
GK16ruyalssu:714: yatra ca prakṛte vākyārthe vākyārthāntaramāropyate sāmānādhikaraṇyena tatra saṃbandhānupapattimūlā nidarśanaiva yuktā,
GK16ruyalssu:721: iyaṃ copemeya upamānavṛttasyāsaṃbhavātpratipāditā pūrvaiḥ vastutastūpameyavṛttasyopamāne 'saṃbhavādapi bhavati /
GK16ruyalssu:734: śvapucchamavanāmitaṃ badhirakarṇajāpaḥ kṛtaḥ dhṛto 'ndhamukhadarpaṇo yadabudho janaḥ sevitaḥ' //
GK16ruyalssu:737: 'utkope tvayi kiñcideva calati drāggūrjarakṣmābhṛtā muktā bhūrna paraṃ bhayānmarujuṣāṃ yāvattadeṇīdṛśām /
GK16ruyalssu:738: padbhyāṃ haṃsagatirmukhena śaśinaḥ kāntiḥ kucābhyāmapi kṣāmābhyāṃ sahasaiva vanyakariṇāṃ gaṇḍasthalīvibhramaḥ' //
GK16ruyalssu:740: sā ca tayoranupapannā sādṛśyaṃ gamayatīti asaṃbhavadvastusaṃbanvanibandhanā nidarśanā /
GK16ruyalssu:742: bhedaprādhānye upamānādupameyasyādhikye viparyaye vā vyatirekaḥ // RuAss_29 //
GK16ruyalssu:750: 'kṣīṇaḥ kṣoṇo 'pi śaśī bhūyo bhūyo vivardhate satyam /
GK16ruyalssu:751: virama prasīda sundari yauvanamanivarti yātaṃ tu' //
GK16ruyalssu:781: atra vighaṭanaṃ saṃbandhibhedādbhinnaṃ na tu śliṣṭam /
GK16ruyalssu:786: karmasāhitye yathā - 'dyujano mutyunā sārdhaṃ yasyājau tārakāmaye /
GK16ruyalssu:791: 'utkṣitpaṃ saha kauśikasya pulakaiḥ sārdhaṃ mukhairnāmitaṃ bhūpānāṃ janakasya saṃśayadhiyā sākaṃ samāsphālitam /
GK16ruyalssu:792: vaidehyā manasā samaṃ ca sahasākṛṣṭaṃ tato bhārgava- prauḍhāhaṅkṛtikandalena ca samaṃ tad bhagnamaiśaṃ dhanuḥ' //
GK16ruyalssu:798: tedve sattvāsattve yatra kasyacidasaṃnidhānānnibadhyete sā dvidhā vinoktiḥ /
GK16ruyalssu:802: 'vinayena vinā kā śrīḥ kā niśā śaśinā vinā /
GK16ruyalssu:804: atra vināśabdamantareṇāpi vinārthavivakṣā yathākathañcinnimittībhavati yathā sahoktau sahārthavivakṣā /
GK16ruyalssu:806: 'nirarthakaṃ janma gataṃ nalinyā yathā na dṛṣṭaṃ tuhināṃśubimbam /
GK16ruyalssu:807: utpattirindorapi niṣphalaiva na yena dṛṣṭā nalinī prabuddhā' //
GK16ruyalssu:821: iha prastutāprastutānāṃ kvacid vācyatvaṃ kvacid gamyatvamiti dvaividhyam /
GK16ruyalssu:822: vācyatvaṃ ca śleṣanirdeśabhaṅgyā pṛthagupādānena vetyapi dvaividhyam /
GK16ruyalssu:824: gumyatvaṃ tu prastutaniṣṭhamaprastutapraśaṃsāviṣayaḥ aprastutaniṇṭhaṃ tu samāsoktiviṣayaḥ /
GK16ruyalssu:830: tacca viśeṣaṇasāmyaṃ śliṣṭatayā sādhāraṇyenaupamyagarbhatvena ca bhavat tridhā bhavati
GK16ruyalssu:831: tatra śliṣṭatayā yathā - 'upoḍharāgeṇa vilolatārakaṃ tathā gṛhītaṃ śaśinā niśāmukham
GK16ruyalssu:832: ṣa yathā samastaṃ timirāṃśukaṃ tayā puro 'pi rāgādgalitaṃ na lakṣitam' //
GK16ruyalssu:835: sādhāraṇyena yathā - 'tanvī manoramā bālā lolākṣī puṣpahāsinī /
GK16ruyalssu:846: atra dantaprabhā puṣpāṇīveti suveṣatvavaśādupamāgarbhatvena kṛte samāse paścāddantaprabhāsadṛśaiḥ puṣpaiściteti samāsāntarāśrayaṇena samānaviśeṣaṇamāhātmyāllatāvyavahārapratītiḥ
GK16ruyalssu:847: atraiva 'parītā hariṇekṣaṇā' iti pāṭhe upamārūpasādhakabāghakābhāvāt saṃkarasamāśrayeṇa kṛte yojane paścāt pūrvavat samāsāntaramahimnā latāpratītijñaṃyā
GK16ruyalssu:848: rūpakagarbhatvena tu samāsāntarāśrayaṇāt samānaviṣeṣaṇatvaṃ bhavadapi na samāsokteḥ prayojakam /
GK16ruyalssu:855: dhārānipātaiḥ saha kiṃ nu vāntaścandro 'yamitpārtataraṃ rarāsa' //
GK16ruyalssu:856: atra nirīkṣaṇānuguṇyādvidyunnayanairiti rūpake payodasya draṣṭṛpuruṣanirūpaṇamārtataraṃ rarāsetyatra pratīyamānotprekṣāyā nimittatvaṃ bhajate
GK16ruyalssu:859: kuṭilalipibhiḥ kaṃ kāyasthaṃ na nāma visūtrayan vyadhita virahiprāṇeṣvāyavyayāvadhikaṃ madhuḥ' [śrī. ca. 670] //
GK16ruyalssu:860: atra hi pattralipikāyasthaśabdeṣu śleṣagarbhe rūpakaṃ dvirephamaṣīlavairityetadrūpakanimittam /
GK16ruyalssu:861: asya ca pracuraḥ prayogaviṣaya iti na samāsoktibuddhiḥ kāryā /
GK16ruyalssu:867: iyaṃ ca śuddhakāryasamāropeṇa viśeṣaṇasāmyenobhayamayatvena prathamaṃ tridhā samāsoktiḥ /
GK16ruyalssu:873: śāstrīye vā laukikavastuvyavahāramāropa iti caturdhā bhavati /
GK16ruyalssu:876: 'vilikhati kucāvuccairgāḍhaṃ karoti kacagrahaṃ likhati lalite vaktre pattrāvalīmasamañjasām /
GK16ruyalssu:877: kṣitipa khadiraḥ śroṇībimbād vikarṣati cāṃśukaṃ marubhuvi haṭhāt trasyantīnāṃ tavārimṛgīdṛśām' //
GK16ruyalssu:880: 'nirlūnānyalakāni pāṭitamuraḥ kṛtsno 'dharaḥ khaṇḍitaḥ karṇe rugjanitā kṛtaṃ ca nayane nīlābjakānte kṣatam /
GK16ruyalssu:881: yāntīnāmatisaṃbhramākulapadanyāsaṃ marau nīrasaiḥ kiṃ kiṃ kaṇṭakibhiḥ kṛtaṃ na tarubhistvadvairivāmabhruvām' //
GK16ruyalssu:887: antarnimagracarapuṣpaśaro 'titāpāt kiṃ kiṃ cakāra taruṇo na yadīkṣaṇāgniḥ' //
GK16ruyalssu:890: lopaḥ kṛtaḥ kila paratvajuṣo vibhakte- stairlakṣaṇaṃ tava kṛtaṃ dhruvameva manye' //
GK16ruyalssu:892: 'sīmānaṃ na jagāma yannayanayornānyena yatsaṃgataṃ na spṛṣṭaṃ vacasā kadācidapi yad dṛṣṭopamānaṃ na yat /
GK16ruyalssu:893: arthādāpatitaṃ na yanna ca na yattatkiñcideṇīdṛśāṃ lāvaṇyaṃ jayati pramāṇarahitaṃ cetaścamatkārakam' //
GK16ruyalssu:904: 'gaṇḍānte madadantināṃ prahṛrataḥ kṣmāmaṇḍale vaidhṛte rakṣāmācarataḥ sadā vidadhato lāṭeṣu yātrotsavam /
GK16ruyalssu:905: pūrvāmatyajataḥ sthitiṃ śubhakarīmāsevyamānasya te vardhante vijayaśriyaḥ kimiva na śreyasvināṃ maṅgalam' //
GK16ruyalssu:907: 'prasarpattātparyairapi sadanumānaikarasikai- rapi jñeyo no yaḥ parimitagatitvaṃ parijahṛt /
GK16ruyalssu:909: budhairityavasito na vācyo no lakṣyastava sahṛdayasyo guṇagaṇaḥ' //
GK16ruyalssu:921: 'paśyantī trapayeva yatra tirayatyātmānamābhyantare yatra truṭyati madhyamāpi madhuradhvanyujjihāsārasāt /
GK16ruyalssu:922: cāṭūccāraṇacāpalaṃ vidadhatāṃ vāk tatra bāhyā kathaṃ devyā te parayā prabho saha rahaḥkrīḍādṛḍhāliṅgane' //
GK16ruyalssu:925: tatra śuddhakāryasamārope kāryasya viśeṣaṇatvamaupacārikamāśritya viśeṣaṇasāmyāditi lakṣaṇaṃ pūrvaśāstrānusāreṇa vihitaṃ yathākathañcid yojyam
GK16ruyalssu:932: tayoḥ samāsoktyā nāyakatvapratītiriti cet ārdranakhakṣatābhamaindraṃ dhanurdadhānetyetadviśeṣaṇaṃ
GK16ruyalssu:936: atrocyate-ekadeśavivartinyupamā yadi pratipadaṃ noktā tat sā kena pratiṣiddhā /
GK16ruyalssu:938: athātra nopamānatvena nāyakaḥ svasvarūpeṇa pratīyate apitu raviśaśinorevanāyakatvapratītiḥ /
GK16ruyalssu:940: tadatrārdranakhakṣatābhamityatra sthitamapi śrutyopamānatvaṃ vastuparyālocanayā aindre dhanuṣi saṃcāraṇīyam,
GK16ruyalssu:942: yathā 'dadhnā juhoti' ityādau dadhni saṃcaryate vidhiḥ /
GK16ruyalssu:944: iha punaḥ ityatra saraḥśriyāṃ nāyikātvapratītirna samāsoktyā,
GK16ruyalssu:949: yatra tu 'keśapāśālivṛndena' ityādau samāsoktāyāmupamāyāṃ samāsantariṇa viśeṣaṇasāmyaṃ yojayituṃ śakyaṃ tatraupamyagarbhaviśeṣaṇaprabhāvitā samāsoktireveti na virodhaḥ kaścit /
GK16ruyalssu:950: sā ca samāroktirarthāntaranyāse kacitsamarthyagatatvena kacitsamarthakagatatvena ca bhavati /
GK16ruyalssu:955: anākramya jagat sarve no saṃdhyāṃ bhajate raviḥ' //
GK16ruyalssu:956: atropagūḍhatvena śāntataḍitkaṭākṣatvena ca śaśāṅkaśaradornāyakavyavahārapratītau samāsoktyāliṅgita evārtho viśeṣarūpaḥ sāmānyāśrayeṇārthāntaranyāsena samarthyate /
GK16ruyalssu:959: asamātpetyādau tu strīśabdasya sāmānyena strītvamātrābhidhānāt sāmānyarūpo 'rtho
GK16ruyalssu:964: atra nirmokapaṭṭāpahnavena samāropitāyā mandākinyā yadvastuvṛttena pādamūle veṣṭanaṃ taccaraṇamūle veṣṭanatvena śleṣamūlayātiśayoktyādhyavasīyate
GK16ruyalssu:968: evaṃ 'nakhakṣatānīva vanasthalīnām' ityatrāpi vanasthalīnāṃ nāyikāvyavahāra utprekṣāntarānupraviṣṭasamāsoktimūla eva /
GK16ruyalssu:975: evaṃ ca pratīyamānāṃśasya vācyonmukhatvātparikara iti sārthakaṃ nāma /
GK16ruyalssu:976: 'rājño mānadhanasya kārmukabhṛto duryodhanasyāgrataḥ pratyakṣaṃ kurubāndhavasya miṣataḥ karṇasya śalyasya ca /
GK16ruyalssu:977: pītaṃ tasya mayādya pāṇḍavavadhūkeśāmbarākarṣiṇaḥ koṣṇaṃ jīvata eva tīkṣṇakarajakṣuṇṇādasṛgvakṣasaḥ' //
GK16ruyalssu:981: sāṃprataṃ rakṣainaṃ bhīmād duḥśāsanam' ityādau jñeyam /
GK16ruyalssu:986: tatra dvayoḥ prākaraṇikayoraprākaraṇikayoḥ prākaraṇikāprakaraṇikayor vā śliṣṭapadopanibandhe śleṣaḥ /
GK16ruyalssu:987: tatrādyaṃ prakāradvayaṃ viśeṣaṇaviśeṣyasāmya eva tṛtīyastu prakāro viśeṣaṇasāmya eva bhavati /
GK16ruyalssu:993: 'yena dhvastamanobhavena balijitkāyaḥ purāstrīkṛto yaścodvṛttabhujaṅgahāravalayo gaṅgā ca yo 'dhārayat /
GK16ruyalssu:994: yasyāhuḥ śaśimacchirohara iti stutyaṃ ca nāmāmarāḥ pāyātsa svayamandhakakṣayakarastvāṃ sarvadomādhavaḥ' //
GK16ruyalssu:997: 'svecchopajātaviṣayo 'pi na yāti vaktuṃ dehīti mārgaṇaśataiśca dadāti duḥkham /
GK16ruyalssu:1010: nirasya puṣpeṣu ruciṃ samagrāṃ padmā virejuḥ śramaṇā yathaiva' //
